channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Inflation heats up in June as President Trump's tariffs start to bite
item.description: Consumer prices were up 2.7% from a year ago — a larger annual increase than the month before.

item.title: Action must follow Trump's 'remarkable shift' on Russia, says Sen. Richard Blumenthal
item.description: A bipartisan bill in Congress would enable President Trump to slap "bone-crushing sanctions" on Russia, says Democratic Sen. Richard Blumenthal of Con...

item.title: In Britain, hopes are mounting to finally clean up sewage-polluted waterways

item.title: A comprehensive list of 2025 tech layoffs
item.description: A complete list of all the known layoffs in tech, from Big Tech to startups, broken down by month throughout 2024.

item.title: A Florida county leads the way with a high-tech 911 system that improves emergency response
item.description: Collier County, Florida, uses one of the most advanced 911 systems in the U.S., allowing callers to send texts and videos.

item.title: Reddit rolls out age verification in the UK to comply with new rules
item.description: Reddit users in the UK will have to upload their ID or a selfie to access potentially harmful content.

item.title: Uber’s latest robotaxi partner is China’s Baidu
item.description: Baidu is the latest addition to Uber's growing list of autonomous vehicle partners, which includes Waymo, Volkswagen, May Mobility, and Pony AI.

item.title: Rivian taps Google to bring custom maps into its EVs and app
